name: VR Shooting Range
description:
Our video game which is a VR shooting game but our target is people who want to boost aim gun etc. This game controller is so realistic like real pistol. VR Aim Booster game have some difficulty levels like easy, medium, hard and this difficulties has different aim speed so if you want to improve to use the pistol like beginner or professional, you can choose  appropriate level.

Controls;

You must a VR controller to play this video game.

This video game using Classic VR controller and buttons.
